items.content_html: "@bolomio/cognito-authorizer" is a lightweight open-source npm package that provides functions for authenticating with Amazon Cognito using different authentication flows. It allows you to easily authenticate with Amazon Cognito user pools in your Node.js applications.
items.title: bolomio/cognito-authorizer: "@bolomio/cognito-authorizer" is a lightweight open-source npm package that provides functions for authenticating with Amazon Cognito using different authentication flows. It allows you to easily authenticate with Amazon Cognito user pools in your Node.js applications.
